title: How_To_Draw_Manga_-_Making_Anime.rar
description:
Paperback: 135 pages
Publisher: Graphic-Sha Publishing
Language: English
ISBN13: 9784766112399
ISBN10: 4766112393
Format: PDF
Size: 30 MB

How to Draw Manga: Making Anime shows you how the professionals produce top notch animes and gives you a behind the scenes look that reveals many tricks of the trade. Top anime houses, AIC and Yoyogi Animation Gakuin take you step-by-step through the complete animation production process using popular anime series such as Moldiver and Armitage III to illustrate the lessons. If you are interested in working in the animation industry or even just a casual anime fan, Making Anime is a must-have book
